ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, Anybody tried crawling twitter searches recently? Before, the following seed should work: http://search.twitter.com/search?q=%23sgmemory&rpp=100 However,

Anybody tried crawling twitter searches recently?

ng seed should work: http://search.twitter.com/search?q=3D%23sgmemory&rpp=
=3D100

h/%23sgmemory?q=3D%23sgmemory
